Key Match Events: Pete Alonso crushed a three-run homer in the ninth inning to put the Mets in the lead.
David Peterson induced a ground-ball double play to close out the game.
Pre-Game Insights: Steve Cohen was in attendance for all three contests of the series and was spotted with former New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie in Games 1 and 2.
Post-Match Reflections: Steve Cohen expressed his pride in the team's dramatic win, comparing it to a movie plot.
Francisco Lindor was seen hugging and lifting Steve Cohen off the ground in excitement after the win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets' win was described as a Hollywood script by Steve Cohen.
Steve Cohen was present for the game and celebrated with the team in the clubhouse.
Others: The Mets' victory marked a significant win in the NL Wild Card Series.
